verses.verse: הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not צָבָ֣א <WH6635> [Is there] not an appointed time לֶאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> to man [עַל־ כ] (עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and אָ֑רֶץ <WH5921> and ק) וְכִימֵ֖י <WH3117> also like the days שָׂכִ֣יר <WH7916> of a hired יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> the days

כְּעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> As a servant יִשְׁאַף־ <WH7602> earnestly desireth צֵ֑ל <WH6738> the shadow וּ֝כְשָׂכִ֗יר <WH7916> and as an hireling יְקַוֶּ֥ה <WH6960> looketh פָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH6467> for [the reward of] his work

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So הָנְחַ֣לְתִּי <WH5157> So am I made to possess לִ֭י יַרְחֵי־ <WH3391> months שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> of vanity וְלֵיל֥וֹת <WH3915> nights עָ֝מָ֗ל <WH5999> and wearisome מִנּוּ־ <WH4487> are appointed לִֽי׃

אִם־ <WH518> When שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <WH7901> When I lie down וְאָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I say מָתַ֣י <WH4970> When אָ֭קוּם <WH6965> When shall I arise וּמִדַּד־ <WH4059> be gone עָ֑רֶב <WH6153> and the night וְשָׂבַ֖עְתִּי <WH7646> am continually נְדֻדִ֣ים <WH5076> of tossings to and fro עֲדֵי־ <WH5704> until נָֽשֶׁף׃ <WH5399> unto the dawning of the day

לָ֘בַ֤שׁ <WH3847> is clothed בְּשָׂרִ֣י <WH1320> My flesh רִ֭מָּה <WH7415> with worms [וְגִישׁ כ] (וְג֣וּשׁ <WH1487> clod ק) עָפָ֑ר <WH6083> of dust עוֹרִ֥י <WH5785> my skin רָ֝גַ֗ע <WH7280> is broken וַיִּמָּאֵֽס׃ <WH3988> and become loathsome

יָמַ֣י <WH3117> My days קַ֭לּוּ <WH7043> are swifter מִנִּי־ <WH4480> than אָ֑רֶג <WH708> than a weaver's shuttle וַ֝יִּכְל֗וּ <WH3615> and are spent בְּאֶ֣פֶס <WH657> without תִּקְוָֽה׃ <WH8615> hope

זְ֭כֹר <WH2142> O remember כִּי־ <WH3588> for ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> [is] wind חַיָּ֑י <WH2416> that my life לֹא־ <WH3808> will not תָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> shall no more עֵ֝ינִ֗י <WH5869> mine eye לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> see טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תְ֭שׁוּרֵנִי <WH7789> me shall see עֵ֣ין <WH5869> The eye רֹ֑אִי <WH7210> of him that hath seen עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> me no [more] thine eyes בִּ֣י וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <WH369> else

כָּלָ֣ה <WH3615> is consumed עָ֭נָן <WH6051> [As] the cloud וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <WH1980> is gone כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So יוֹרֵ֥ד <WH3381> so he that goeth down שְׁ֝א֗וֹל <WH7585> to the grave לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַעֲלֶֽה׃ <WH5927> shall come up

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> He shall return ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> no more to his house וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <WH5234> know ע֣וֹד <WH5750> anymore מְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> neither shall his place

גַּם־ <WH1571> Therefore אֲנִי֮ <WH589> I לֹ֤א <WH3808> I will not אֶחֱשָׂ֫ךְ <WH2820> Therefore I will not refrain פִּ֥י <WH6310> my mouth אֲ‍ֽ֭דַבְּרָה <WH1696> I will speak בְּצַ֣ר <WH6862> in the anguish רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> of my spirit אָ֝שִׂ֗יחָה <WH7878> I will complain בְּמַ֣ר <WH4751> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> of my soul
הֲ‍ֽיָם־ <WH3220> [Am] I a sea אָ֭נִי <WH589> I אִם־ <WH518> or תַּנִּ֑ין <WH8577> or a whale כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that תָשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> that thou settest עָלַ֣י <WH5921> over מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> a watch

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> When I say תְּנַחֲמֵ֣נִי <WH5162> shall comfort עַרְשִׂ֑י <WH6210> My bed יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> shall ease בְ֝שִׂיחִ֗י <WH7878> commune מִשְׁכָּבִֽי׃ <WH4904> me my couch
וְחִתַּתַּ֥נִי <WH2865> Then thou scarest בַחֲלֹמ֑וֹת <WH2472> me with dreams וּֽמֵחֶזְיֹנ֥וֹת <WH2384> me through visions תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <WH1204> and terrifiest
וַתִּבְחַ֣ר <WH977> chooseth מַחֲנָ֣ק <WH4267> strangling נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> So that my soul מָ֝֗וֶת <WH4194> [and] death מֵֽעַצְמוֹתָֽי׃ <WH6106> rather than my life

מָ֭אַסְתִּי <WH3988> I loathe לֹא־ <WH3808> not לְעֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> alway אֶֽחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> [it] I would not live חֲדַ֥ל <WH2308> let me alone מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> alone כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> [are] vanity יָמָֽי׃ <WH3117> for my days

מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <WH582> What [is] man כִּ֣י <WH3588> that תְגַדְּלֶ֑נּוּ <WH1431> that thou shouldest magnify וְכִי־ <WH3588> should תָשִׁ֖ית <WH7896> him? and that thou shouldest set אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> thine heart
וַתִּפְקְדֶ֥נּוּ <WH6485> And [that] thou shouldest visit לִבְקָרִ֑ים <WH1242> him every morning לִ֝רְגָעִ֗ים <WH7281> instant תִּבְחָנֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH974> [and] try

כַּ֭מָּה <WH4100> How long לֹא־ <WH3808> never תִשְׁעֶ֣ה <WH8159> wilt thou not depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor תַ֝רְפֵּ֗נִי <WH7503> from me nor let me alone עַד־ <WH5704> until בִּלְעִ֥י <WH1104> till I swallow down רֻקִּֽי׃ <WH7536> spit-ting

חָטָ֡אתִי <WH2398> I have sinned מָ֤ה <WH4100> have I אֶפְעַ֨ל ׀ <WH6466> what shall I do לָךְ֮ נֹצֵ֪ר <WH5341> unto thee O thou preserver הָאָ֫דָ֥ם <WH120> man לָ֤מָה <WH4100> have You שַׂמְתַּ֣נִי <WH7760> set לְמִפְגָּ֣ע <WH4645> me as a mark לָ֑ךְ וָאֶהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> I am עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and לְמַשָּֽׂא׃ <WH4853> against thee so that I am a burden

וּמֶ֤ה ׀ <WH4100> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> And why dost thou not pardon פִשְׁעִי֮ <WH6588> my transgression וְתַעֲבִ֪יר <WH5674> and take away אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֫נִ֥י <WH5771> fault כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> henceforth לֶעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> in the dust אֶשְׁכָּ֑ב <WH7901> will lie וְשִׁ֖חֲרְתַּ֣נִי <WH7836> and thou shalt seek me in the morning וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <WH369> else פ
